hero.title: Our focus is on developing aesthetically striking and individual architectural projects that inspire and improve the way people live.

AboutUs.title: Where Vision Meets Precision  Architecture Designed for Impact.

description.first: KRAS Architecture & Design is a dynamic firm operating between Berlin and Pristina. We specialize in architecture, interior design, 3D visualization, landscape planning, and technical consulting delivering comprehensive, innovative design solutions tailored to each client.
description.second: What sets us apart is our hybrid team structure: a highly skilled production team based in Pristina and strategic leadership in Berlin. This model blends German precision with Balkan efficiency, ensuring exceptional quality at competitive rates.
description.third: Our experienced architects, planners, and designers are well-versed in both local and international building standards. We serve a diverse clientele, including real estate developers, construction firms, architecture and interior design studios (as collaborative partners), and private clients helping them scale, innovate, and deliver projects faster.
description.fourth: Whether you’re launching a new development or seeking expert design support, KRAS Architecture & Design is your trusted partner for impactful architectural solutions.

ourValues.title: At KRAS, we believe in delivering more than just design we deliver value through:
ourValues.first: Smart, modern solutions powered by advanced tools and workflows
ourValues.second: Speed and reliability without compromising quality
ourValues.third: Affordable, cross-border collaboration for maximum efficiency
ourValues.fourth: Sustainable, future-ready planning in every project
ourValues.fifth: Client-first service built on precision, professionalism, and trust

AboutUs.ceoDescription: The Chief Executive Officer (CEO) holds the top executive position within a company. They oversee the organization's overall operations and resource management, make key strategic decisions, and serve as the primary link between the board of directors and the company's day-to-day activities
AboutUs.partnerDescription: Our Partners are individuals or organizations that have established a formal collaboration with our company. They contribute essential expertise, resources, and networks that support our strategic objectives and help us broaden our impact in the market.
AboutUs.teamLeaderDescription: Our Team Leaders are seasoned professionals responsible for directing and supporting teams within specific projects or departments. They set clear goals, delegate tasks, offer ongoing guidance, and ensure that projects are completed efficiently and successfully.
AboutUs.supervisorDescription: Our Supervisors manage the full project lifecycle—from planning and execution to completion. They collaborate with stakeholders to define objectives, develop detailed project plans, allocate resources effectively, track progress, and ensure timely, on-budget delivery that meets all quality standards.
AboutUs.architectDescription: Our Architects are expert professionals who design the core structure and architecture of our software systems. They evaluate technical requirements, craft robust solutions, and ensure our systems are built to be scalable, secure, and high-performing.
AboutUs.financeDescription: Our Finance team oversees the financial well-being of the company. They manage budgeting, forecasting, financial planning, accounting, and reporting to ensure we meet our obligations, maintain profitability, and deliver accurate financial insights.

metaData.description: KRAS Architecture & Design (Berlin & Pristina) delivers fast, affordable, and sustainable architecture, interiors, 3D visuals, and landscape design—combining German precision with Balkan efficiency for clients across Europe.
